name: Davis Werner
description:
I am an easygoing person , caring , loving , kool , calm , kind , generous , faithful ,
honest , discipline, humble , God fearing and I’m more interested in spiritual happiness than material gain. I try to remain as humble as possible. I’m no saint by any means but It is important to me. I love children, I’m childlike, love to laugh and joke, keep things light and count my blessing. I don’t drink, but don’t hold it against any one who does, It’s their choice and I don’t judge them, just want them to be themselves. Let’s talk. But at this point in my life I’m waiting for the total package, a companion, friend and a loving man
